text: Hello, quick question - one of our clients wants to find a hero module to use with their HubSpot boilerplate theme. Is it possible to purchase modules in the Marketplace to use with themes like we used to with Templates? I have  not found anything yet so I suspect the hero module must be custom created in the design manager. Thank you for any insight you have to share!
When editing pages you can search or scroll to the bottom to see all modules. Marketplace and non theme scoped modules should appear here.
Right, but they work seamlessly with the theme being used?
they should but some may not
from what I have seen, most marketplace modules can stand alone
and any global typography styles should apply.
<@U025L73EMA6> out of curiosity, may I ask why your client wants a custom hero module from the marketplace?

The slider hero they are using was brought over as-is when HubSpot did the site migration from their old WordPress site. The hero does not have many options and the H1 tag sits at the bottom of the slider - bad place for it.
